scene_description_enriched: Two haloed figures stand facing forward, each holding a stylized orange palm frond. The figure on the left wears a patterned grey cloak over a red garment, while the figure on the right is clad in a blue robe beneath a similar patterned grey cloak. The background depicts a green, undulating landscape with a blue sky and distant blue structures, possibly representing mountains or a city. The scene is framed by an arched border decorated with gold leaf and floral motifs.
